Articles.Content: You know how the turrerts in bd armory track your cursor, Well why doesnt someone make a mod that makes the ship aim in the direction of the cursor.

So, something like this? Use it with chase cam and it'll be fairly close to what you want (point at something and it will rotate towards it)
